thread.section_title: The Union Democrat, Sonora, CA News, Sports, & Weather
thread.title: Calendar for Oct. 1, 2015

title: Calendar for Oct. 1, 2015
text: Calendar for Oct. 1, 2015 Calendar for Oct. 1, 2015 By Union Democrat staff October 01, 2015 01:00 am For complete arts and entertainment listings, see the Weekender, published Thursdays in The Union Democrat. TODAY Sierra Club day hike, meet 8 a.m., Mary Laveroni Community Park, Highway 120, Groveland. ATCAA Food Bank distribution, 10 a.m. to 2 p.m., Columbia College, 11600 Columbia College Drive, Sonora. Storytime and Craft, children through age 5, 10:30 a.m., Tuolumne County Library, 480 Greenley Road, Sonora, 533-5507. Columbia Chamber of Commerce Farmers Market, 5 to 8 p.m., Main Street, Columbia State Historic Park, Main Street. Tuolumne County Arts Alliance Board of Directors, 5:30 p.m., 251 S. Barretta St., Sonora, 532-2787. Tuolumne County Republican Central Committee, 6 p.m., Tuolumne County Administration Building, 2 S. Green St., Sonora, 532-5352. Tuolumne County Airport Land Use Commission, 6 p.m., airport administration office, 10723 Airport Road, Columbia. FRIDAY Preschool Story Hour, “Stories with Grandma,” 11 a.m., Tuolumne branch library, 18636 Main St., Tuolumne, 928-3612. Sing Along, 11 to 11:30 a.m., Sierra Waldorf School, 19234 Rawhide Road, Jamestown, 984-0454. Veterans of Foreign Wars Post 3154 and Auxiliary, 7 p.m., Veterans Memorial Hall, 9 N. Washington St., Sonora. CALAVERAS COUNTY Murphys Business Association, 8:30 a.m., Gold Country Coffee Roasting Co., 728-9325. Storytime, 11 to 11:40 a.m., Calaveras County Library, Copperopolis branch, Lake Tulloch Plaza. National Active and Retired Federal Employees Association, noon, Black Bart Inn, 55 W. St. Charles St., San Andreas, 772-1854. Landscape and Lighting District Committee, 2 p.m., Fireside Room, Greenhorn Creek, Angels Camp, 736-2181. Wallace/Burson Business Association, 7 p.m., Rossetti’s, 7670 Highway 12, Wallace, 763-5037, 763-5130. FRIDAY Michelson Elementary Parent Club, 8:15 a.m., 196 Pennsylvania Gulch Road, Murphys, 728-3441. Angels Camp Library Storytime, 10 a.m., Angels Camp branch library, 426 N. Main St., 736-2198. The Union Democrat Calendar attempts to list all non-commercial events of public interest in the greater Tuolumne and Calaveras county areas. Contributions are welcome. Call 588-4547, visit 84 S. Washington St., Sonora, or email This e-mail address is being protected from spam bots, you need JavaScript enabled to view it Follow UnionDemocrat.com
